meanings.definition: A smaller development within a larger development.
meanings.sent1: The new playground is one of the subdevelopments in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The subdevelopments in the city include small parks and community centers.
meanings.sent3: The subdevelopments in the housing complex are like hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the subdevelopments is like finding secret passages in a grand castle.
meanings.sent5: The variety of subdevelopments adds charm and character to the main development.

meanings.definition: The act or process of developing something further.
meanings.sent1: The subdevelopments of the plan involved expanding the existing features.
meanings.sent2: Her innovative ideas led to exciting subdevelopments in the project.
meanings.sent3: The subdevelopments in the story kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: Each subdevelopment in the research opened up new possibilities for exploration.
meanings.sent5: The subdevelopments in technology continue to shape our future.
